root.name: Burger Island
root.description: GameplayBurger Island is a game where you compete against the clock to prepare burgers, fries, and milkshakes for hungry customers. There are over 30 recipes for you to unlock as you progress through the game, which is comprised of 60 levels.There are multiple goals to accomplish as you prepare your dishes:Keep the customer happy to earn more tipsBuy new recipesOpen new restaurants in 5 different locations
